name: Shadow of Something (itch)
description:
In Shadow of Something, you go to places, do things and kill guys.

A game for the Idle Thumbs Wizard Jam. All kinds of broken, and will probably only work on 64 bit to begin with.

Press Back/Tab to open the menu for a map and to do stuff with the points you get. See the controls text file for the rest of the controls, the game doesn't make everything clear.

Music (CC BY-SA) by Grégoire Lourme - "Excalibur", "Transylvania" and "Dragon Fight"

https://www.jamendo.com/en/artist/560/gregoire-lou...
